subject: NCAA Basketball Tournament (Men)
Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Roburt Sallie seemed as unlikely a hero as one could find Thursday afternoon, but there he was, filling up the basket with 3-pointers and saving the Tigers from an upset in the first round.
snippet: Roburt Sallie seemed as unlikely a hero as one could find Thursday afternoon, but there he was, filling up the basket with 3-pointers and saving the Tigers from an upset in the first round.
